title: Dynamic Filters with Record & User Context
overview:
Configure context-aware filters in the Query component that resolve at runtime.

Record context: Provide a sample Context Record ID in the builder. In the SOQL WHERE clause, reference the page record’s fields directly with :fieldName. Supports up to 5 levels of parent relationships.
Examples: :Id, :AccountId, :Account.Parent.ParentId

User context: When filtering a User lookup or OwnerId field, use tokens like :$User.Id, :$User.Queues, :$User.DirectReports, :$User.Team, :$UserRole.Team.
generalUseCase: Create one reusable query that adapts to the current record and the running user—ideal for Lightning record pages and team-scoped views
